choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews
Day 1:
Breakfast - Overnight oats with chia seeds, flaxseeds, and mixed berries.
Lunch - Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini), avocado, and lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner - Grilled salmon with a side of steamed broccoli and brown rice.
Day 2:
Breakfast - Green smoothie with spinach, kale, banana, almond milk (or any non-dairy milk), and chia seeds.
Lunch - Chickpea salad with roasted vegetables (carrots, beets), cucumber, tomato, and lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner - Lentil curry with brown rice and a side of steamed vegetables.
Day 3:
Breakfast - Banana nut muffins made with almond flour, honey, and chopped nuts (almonds or pistachios).
Lunch - Roasted chicken with roasted sweet potato and green beans.
Dinner - Grilled tofu stir-fry with mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers), brown rice, and almond butter sauce.
Day 4:
Breakfast - Greek yogurt parfait made with non-dairy yogurt, mixed berries, and granola (made without honey).
Lunch - Quinoa bowl with roasted vegetables (cauliflower), avocado, and lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner - Lentil soup with a side of steamed vegetables and whole grain bread.
Day 5:
Breakfast - Oatmeal with mixed berries and almond butter (made without honey).
Lunch - Chickpea salad with roasted vegetables (carrots, beets), cucumber, tomato, and lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner - Grilled shrimp skewers with a side of steamed mixed vegetables and brown rice.
Day 6:
Breakfast - Green smoothie with spinach, kale, banana, almond milk (or any non-dairy milk), and chia seeds.
Lunch - Roasted chicken with roasted sweet potato and green beans.
Dinner - Grilled salmon with a side of steamed broccoli and brown rice.
Day 7:
Breakfast - Banana nut muffins made with almond flour, honey (optional), and chopped nuts (almonds or pistachios).
Lunch - Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini), avocado, and lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner - Grilled tofu stir-fry with mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers), brown rice, and almond butter sauce.
